Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Nibe nani anikunquli oko mna ndikunqulayo
Kanti nam andiyi kukunqula oko nina nikunqulayo
Ukanti nani aniyi kukunqula oko mna ndikunqulayo
Nina ninenkolo yenu nam ndinenkolo yam
Uze ubone abantu bengena enkolweni ka-Allâh (i-Islam) beziindimbane
Zukisa iNkosi yakho ke ngoko ngendumiso, ucele itarhu (kuYo). Inene Yona nguMxoleli Ohlala Esamkela inguquko
Mazitshabalale zombini izandla zika-Abû Lahab, (naye) atshabalale
Ubutyebi bakhe nabantwana bakhe bungamncedi nganto
Entanyeni yakhe uya kuqanyangelwa ngentambo yomthi wesundu
